name: @wowblvck/i18n-ai-translator
description: Automatic translation tool for i18n JSON files

scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos && npm run build:windows
scripts.build:macos: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o bin/i18n-ai-translator-darwin-x64 ./cmd/main.go && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o bin/i18n-ai-translator-darwin-arm64 ./cmd/main.go

author: wowblvck
